distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for curl fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2019-5481: Fixed a double-free during kerberos FTP data transfer. (bsc#1149495)
- CVE-2019-5482: Fixed a TFTP small block size heap buffer overflow (bsc#1149496).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Double-free vulnerability in the FTP-kerberos code in cURL 7.52.0 to 7.65.3.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
